name: Volley Shot
description:
Challenge your skills in this game which combines sports and shooting! Become the best of your friends setting your opposite's score to 0 or reaching 15 points in your score!

In order to decrease your opposite score you need or shoot your enemy or score a point making the ball touches the opposite's side! Besides increasing your score in 1 point, it will decrease your opposite score in 1 point!

DEVELOPERS:
